cta.title: Ready to
cta.subtitle: Don't wait for the next breach. Schedule a personalized demo to see how SECURESIST delivers measurable, human-layer security intelligence across your organization.

footer.description: Transform your organization's cybersecurity posture with intelligent, role-based training that keeps your team engaged and secure.

about.title: About
about.description: At Meta Techs, we recognize that the greatest defense against cyber threats is your people. We are dedicated to providing the tools and knowledge necessary to transform every employee into an active defender.

solution.title: Our Solution:
solution.description1: We created **SECURESIST**, our all-in-one cybersecurity awareness platform, to bridge the gap between technical security and human behavior.
solution.description2: SECURESIST helps organizations of all sizes build a **strong security culture** by turning employees from potential targets into **active defenders** through engaging, personalized, and effective training modules.

empowering.title: Empowering Teams
empowering.description: To make cybersecurity simple, engaging, and effective for every business, empowering teams with confidence.

expert.title: Expert-Led
expert.description: Developed by certified cybersecurity specialists with deep industry expertise.

people.title: People-First
people.description: Easy-to-follow, gamified training that speaks plain language, driving real behavior change.

cta.title: Ready to Meet Your Cybersecurity Goals?
cta.description: Request a free demo and see the SECURESIST difference for yourself.

solutions.title: Comprehensive
solutions.description: Protect your organization with our cutting-edge cybersecurity training and simulation platforms designed for the modern workforce

solution1.title: Cybersecurity Awareness Training
solution1.subtitle: Empower Your Team with Knowledge
solution1.description: Transform your organization's security posture with our comprehensive, role-based cybersecurity training platform. Our interactive modules keep employees engaged while teaching them to recognize and respond to real-world threats.

solution2.title: Phishing Simulation & Testing
solution2.subtitle: Test and Improve Your Defenses
solution2.description: Proactively identify vulnerabilities in your organization's security awareness through realistic phishing simulations. Our platform helps you test employee responses and provides detailed analytics to strengthen your human firewall.

cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Organization?
cta.description: Get started with a free demo and see how SECURESIST can transform your cybersecurity training

partners.title: Partner
partners.description: Together, we help customers build resilient security cultures with role-based training, measurable outcomes, and trusted expertise.

whyPartner.title: Why Partner with Us
whyPartner.description: Grow revenue, deliver measurable outcomes, and elevate your services portfolio

benefit1.title: Expert-Led Platform
benefit1.description: Built by Meta Techs cybersecurity specialists with proven methodologies.

benefit2.title: Attach to Existing Services

benefit3.title: Faster Customer Outcomes
benefit3.description: Launch quickly with curated content, automation, and measurable insights.

benefit4.title: Enablement & Certification
benefit4.description: Training materials, playbooks, and co-selling resources for your team.

benefit5.title: Enterprise-Ready
benefit5.description: Security, privacy, and reporting controls for regulated industries.

benefit6.title: Dedicated Partner Support
benefit6.description: Access to solution engineers and partner success resources.

joinForm.title: Join Our Partner Program

roleBased.title: Role-Based Content

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: SECURESIST makes cybersecurity awareness simple and effective in just a few steps

step1.title: Set Up Your Program
step1.description: Choose your training goals, audience, and schedule. The platform is quick to configure and ready to launch.

step2.title: Deliver Engaging Training
step2.description: Employees receive short, interactive lessons and phishing simulations designed to fit into their daily workflow.

step3.title: Monitor Progress
step3.description: Track completion rates, quiz scores, and simulation results in easy-to-read dashboards.

step4.title: Identify Risks
step4.description: Spot which teams or individuals need extra support, and target training where it's needed most.

step5.title: Strengthen Your Security Culture
step5.description: Over time, your workforce becomes more aware, more confident, and better equipped to stop cyber threats.
